commandAbilities.name: All-out Attack
commandAbilities.description: You can use this command ability when you pick a friendly unit to shoot in your shooting phase or fight in the combat phase. That unit must receive the command. Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by that unit until the end of that phase.
commandAbilities.flavor: With a singular purpose, these warriors attack with all of their might.

commandAbilities.name: All-out Defence
commandAbilities.description: You can use this command ability when a friendly unit is picked as the target of an attack in the shooting or combat phase. That unit must receive the command. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until the end of that phase.
commandAbilities.flavor: With consummate skill, these cunning warriors protect themselves from attack.
